text: 4.20: 1 Zo 2.4; 3.17; 4.12Maaŋ muuŋgip, guma the khaŋ suanga, “Gu guigira won ndavar Fhe Bakɨme ga nɨɨŋgi.” Ana maaŋ suaŋv, ana guigira won ndavar guigira Zisas khothɨgi guma gu mbiga the ndɨɨi fhu, mba guma, ana bigi guiguigi guma ma. Guma the Fhe Bakɨme gangi fhu. Maaŋ muuŋgip, guma the kha won rɨmanin gari gumgi gu mbigi, ana won ndavar mbe ndɨɨi fhu, ana ram muuŋgip, won rɨmanin gangi fhup Fhe Bakɨme, ana guigira won ndavar ana nɨɨŋgirie?
